titleStmt.title: The heart of N-England rent at the blasphemies of the present generation. Or A brief tractate, concerning the doctrine of the Quakers, demonstrating the destructive nature thereof, to religion, the churches, and the state, with consideration of the remedy against it. : Occasional satisfaction to objections, and confirmation of the contrary trueth. / By John Norton ...
titleStmt.author: Norton, John, 1606-1663.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Samuel Green, at Cambridg in New-England.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library.
